scripts.pngquant: for x in `find . -name 'rollup.config.js' -maxdepth 2 ! -path './alien.js*' -exec dirname {} \;`; do echo "$x" && cd "$x" && rm -rf public/assets/images && cp -r src/images public/assets/ && find public/assets/images -name '**.png' -exec pngquant --strip --ext=.png --force {} \; && cd ..; done
scripts.pngquant-flat: for x in `find . -name 'rollup.config.js' -maxdepth 2 ! -path './alien.js*' -exec dirname {} \;`; do echo "$x" && cd "$x" && rm -f public/assets/*.png && cp src/images/*.png public/assets/ && find public/assets -name '*.png' -exec pngquant --strip --ext=.png --force {} \; && cd ..; done
